name: Idea Generator
description: Generate unique story concepts with AI
author: raymAIzing film

inputs.label: Theme/Message
inputs.placeholder: Redemption, love conquers all, coming of age...

inputs.label: Constraints
inputs.placeholder: Low budget, single location, 2 actors max...

steps.prompt:
Generate 5 unique story concepts:

Genre: {{genre}}
Tone: {{tone}}
Setting: {{setting}}
Target Audience: {{targetAudience}}
Theme: {{theme}}
Constraints: {{constraints}}

For each concept provide:

## CONCEPT 1
- **Title**: [Catchy title]
- **Logline**: [One sentence hook]
- **Synopsis**: [3-4 sentences]
- **Main Characters**:
  - Character 1: Name, role, brief description
  - Character 2: Name, role, brief description
- **Unique Hook**: What makes this different
- **Viral Potential**: Score 1-10 with explanation
- **Why It Works**: For the target audience

[Repeat for concepts 2-5]

## RECOMMENDATION
Which concept has the highest potential and why.
